hero.title: About Loginus ID
hero.description: Loginus ID is a unified account for all Loginus services. Fast and secure authorization, data management, payments and family access in one place.

what.title: What is Loginus ID?
what.description1: Loginus ID is a unified identification and authorization system for all Loginus services. By creating one account, you get access to all capabilities of the Loginus ecosystem.
what.description2: The system is designed with security and personal data protection requirements in mind. All data is stored encrypted and protected according to GOST standards.
what.description3: With Loginus ID, you can manage personal data, documents, payments, family access and much more from a single interface.

security.title: Data Security
security.description: Protection of personal data according to GOST standards. Encryption of all data and secure storage.

auth.title: Single Sign-On
auth.description: One account for all Loginus services. Fast authorization without re-entering passwords.

family.title: Family Access
family.description: Manage family group, children's accounts and shared subscriptions.

payments.title: Payments and Subscriptions
payments.description: Manage payment methods, subscriptions and transaction history.

documents.title: Documents
documents.description: Store and manage important documents in a secure vault.

control.title: Full Control
control.description: Manage data access, privacy settings and security.

speed.title: Fast
speed.description: Instant access to all services without re-authorization

safety.title: Secure
safety.description: GOST standard data protection and two-factor authentication

convenience.title: Convenient
convenience.description: All your data and settings in one place

cta.title: Ready to Start?
cta.description: Create your Loginus ID and get access to all capabilities of the Loginus ecosystem.
